amendment.description: To expand the boundaries of the Ottawa National Wildlife Refuge Complex and the Detroit River International Wildlife Refuge.

vote.text: Amendment SA 207 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 207 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S1439-1440; text: CR S1439-1440) To expand the boundaries of the Ottawa National Wildlife Refuge Complex and the Detroit River International Wildlife Refuge.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 207 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 207 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich.
